synopsis.p: Converts a FasttextAttribute used to describe documents in FasttextClassifierTrain and FasttextClassifierLabel.

string-conversion.p: String conversion is not available for this type.

xml-conversion.p: TOKENS is an expression evaluated from the document element as a list of elements. Each element represents a token.
FORM is an expression evaluated from each token as a string. If omitted then it defaults to @form.
